name: ktistec
description: Ktistec is a small ActivityPub capable microblogging server written in Rust. It allows users to host their own federated social account with timelines, follows and posts, talking to the wider Fediverse from a minimal codebase.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Run your own single-user or small community instance. Own your social media presence

features.title: Posts & Replies
features.description: Create posts, reply to others, and engage in conversations. Full microblogging functionality

features.title: Media Attachments
features.description: Share images and files with your posts. Rich content sharing

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Get notified of mentions, replies, and new followers. Stay engaged with community

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Lightweight server with small resource footprint. Run on modest hardware
